home.tagline: Today's question from somewhere on Earth
home.description:
A question from somewhere on Earth is waiting for you.
Capture today's thoughts.

journal.permissionMessage: We need access to your gallery to pick a photo.
journal.promptSubtitle:
There is no right answer. Write down whatever
comes to mind in this moment.

records.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
records.emptySubtitle: Open a fortune cookie to save your first thought.

questions.q1: What are 3 things you're most grateful for today?
questions.q2: What emotions are you feeling right now in this moment?
questions.q3: What's your biggest goal you want to achieve this year?
questions.q5: What was the most difficult thing recently, and how did you overcome it?
questions.q6: Recall the happiest moment from your childhood.
questions.q7: When was the most important turning point in your life?
questions.q8: What would you like to say to your past self?
questions.q9: What's the most memorable place you've traveled to and what made it special?
questions.q10: What book or movie changed your life?
questions.q11: Where will you be and what will you be doing 10 years from now?
questions.q12: What do you hope to look like this time next year?
questions.q13: What do you definitely want to do before you die?
questions.q14: What small action can you take today toward your dream?
questions.q15: What do you want to do after retirement?
questions.q16: Who is the most precious person in your life and why?
questions.q17: Is there someone you've been thinking about but haven't contacted?
questions.q18: Is there something you haven't said to someone?
questions.q19: What are you grateful to your family for?
questions.q20: What does friendship mean to you?
questions.q21: If you could describe your day in one sentence, what would it be?
questions.q22: Have you started any new habits or hobbies recently?
questions.q23: What was the most delicious food you had today?
questions.q25: What are you most proud of doing today?
questions.q26: What's the most important value in your life?
questions.q27: What does success mean to you?
questions.q28: What do you think a happy life is?
questions.q29: Do you have a life philosophy or motto?
questions.q30: If you had to choose between money and time, which would it be and why?
questions.q31: If you were a color, what would it be and why?
questions.q32: If you were an animal, what would you want to be?
questions.q33: If you had a time machine, would you go to the past or the future?
questions.q34: If you could have a superpower for one day, what would you do?
questions.q35: If your life was a movie, what genre would it be?
questions.q36: What experience has helped you grow recently?
questions.q37: Is there something you're too afraid to do?
questions.q38: What's the biggest lesson you've learned from failure?
questions.q39: What do you want to learn right now?
questions.q40: What made you break through your limits?
